explanation: Agent A is correct. The code contains the statement "if (1) { ... } #ifdef _DEBUG else mhd_assert(...) #endif" — the controlling expression is the constant 1, which is an invariant. Rule 14.3 forbids invariant controlling expressions except for the listed exceptions (infinite loops or the special do-while exception). This use is neither an infinite loop nor the allowed do-while form, so it violates MISRA C 2023 Rule 14.3. The surrounding #ifdef/_DEBUG does not make the controlling expression non-invariant — the expression itself is still the constant 1 when compiled — so the exception does not apply.
